entry.string: If this is your first visit to this part of your Xaraya site, please take a minute to read through the following introduction, in order to explore the different possibilities offered by the Contact module.
entry.translation: Iff thees is yuoor furst feesit tu thees pert ooff yuoor Xereya seete-a, pleese-a teke-a a meenoote-a tu reed thruoogh zee fullooeeng intrudoocshun, in oorder tu ixplure-a zee deefffferent pusseebilities ooffffered by zee Cuntect mudoole-a.

entry.string: "The MyBookmarks module gives your users a way to add their favorite bookmarks to a sitewide database. The Bookmarks block with each users own bookmarks, will be displayed on thier Roles MyAccount page. The Random Bookmarks block will pull a random link from the master database of all users bookmarks."
entry.translation: "Zee MyBuukmerks mudoole-a geefes yuoor users a vey tu edd zeeur fefureete-a buukmerks tu a seetooide-a detebese-a. Zee Buukmerks bluck veet iech users oovn buukmerks, veell be-a deespleyed oon theeer Rules MyEccuoont pege-a. Zee Rundum Buukmerks bluck veell pooll a rundum leenk frum zee mester detebese-a ooff ell users buukmerks. Um gesh dee bork, bork!"

entry.string: "You will need to create a new Privilege Called Addmybookmarks with Add rights and assign it to the Users Group, this will allow each user to add bookmarks."
entry.translation: "Yuoo veell need tu creete-a a noo Preefilege-a Celled Eddmybuukmerks veet Edd reeghts und esseegn it tu zee Users Gruoop, thees veell elloo iech user tu edd buukmerks."

entry.string: "From the Admin menu you will see a listing of all bookmarks added by all users, so you have access to modify, or delete bookmarks."
entry.translation: "Frum zee Edmeen menoo yuoo veell see-a a leesting ooff ell buukmerks edded by ell users, su yuoo hefe-a eccess tu mudeeffy, oor delete-a buukmerks."

entry.string: The Booksmarks Module has three blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Zee Buuksmerks Mudoole-a hes three-a blucks inclooded et thees teeme-a.

entry.string: Random Bookmarks -> Display's a random bookmark from the entire collection of Bookmarks'
entry.translation: Rundum Buukmerks -> Deespley's a rundum buukmerk frum zee inture-a cullecshun ooff Buukmerks'

entry.string: Bookmarks -> Display's users bookmarks, when on the Roles Your Account page.'
entry.translation: Buukmerks -> Deespley's users buukmerks, vhee oon zee Rules Yuoor Eccuoont pege-a.'

entry.string: Top Bookmarks -> Display's the top rated bookmarks'.
entry.translation: Tup Buukmerks -> Deespley's zee tup reted buukmerks'.
